list_definition.definition: any of several edible plants with sharp-tasting leaves used in salads

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: a sandwich filled with egg and cress.

list_ex_of_english: Common names include lilacbush, purple rock cress and rainbow rock cress.

In some regions, garden cress is known as mustard and cress, garden pepper cress, pepperwort pepper grass, or poor man's pepper.

His recipe includes garlic, cucumber, mint, salad cress and crabmeat, which demonstrates the versatility and adaptability of the basic concept.
